summary: Comprehensive pilot-readiness testing completed for BRICK AI Caseworker app. All 26 backend API tests passed. All core features verified working: multi-role auth (6 roles), AI chat with notifications, cleanup sweep posting with notification creation, document vault, resource map with Las Vegas services, and new user registration with auto-generated flashcards.
passed_tests: Landing page displays 'Get Started Free' and 'I Have an Account' buttons
Clicking 'Get Started Free' scrolls to Register form (not Login)
New user registration creates account and auto-generates 12 flashcards
Login works for testuser@example.com (regular user)
Login works for agency@help.org (HELP agency)
Login works for outreach@shinealightlv.org (Shine-A-Light - amber theme)
Login works for team@recoverlv.org (Recover LV - teal theme)
Login works for cleanup@vegas.gov (cleanup crew)
Login works for lawyer@legalaid.org (legal aid)
Regular user sees BRICK chat with notification bell
Notification bell shows unread count and opens panel with sweep alerts
Cleanup crew can post sweeps and notifications are created for users
BRICK AI chat sends and receives messages with markdown formatting
Dossier auto-update notification shows when AI detects relevant info
Vault page loads and shows uploaded documents
Resource map displays 6 Las Vegas services with map markers
Agency dashboards show correct organization branding
Shine-A-Light shows amber/yellow theme
Recover LV shows teal/emerald theme
Legal Aid Portal loads with client cases and workshop scheduling
All API endpoints return correct status codes
Notification system creates sweep alerts for all users when cleanup posts
Flashcards auto-generated for new users (12 cards across 5 categories)
critical_code_review_comments: Minor: React Hook useEffect dependency warnings in multiple components (non-blocking)
Minor: bcrypt version warning in passlib (non-blocking, authentication works correctly)
seed_data_creation: Test sweeps created during testing, test documents uploaded to vault
context_for_next_testing_agent: All pilot-readiness features are working. The notification system is fully functional - cleanup crews can post sweeps and all regular users receive notifications. New user registration auto-generates 12 flashcards. All 6 role-based logins work correctly with appropriate dashboard routing. The Wizard of Oz premium theme is applied consistently across all pages.

authentication.legal_aid_login: Working - redirects to Legal Aid Portal

notification_system.sweep_notifications: Working - created when cleanup posts sweep
